channel.title: Stay away from kidgoku4522
channel.description:
He's a liar, he steals, and he uses RATs to infect computers. What's happen to this community.. Proof: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tMpCK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xIbMY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2icaV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VTLVG.png[/img]

item.title: Stay away from kidgoku4522
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:26, topic:473872”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=591804.msg4183691#msg4183691 date=1355856511]
I don’t. But I do know how keyloggers work up and down. Get me one of his keyloggers and I’ll try to go through it.
[/quote]

If he’s smart - it won’t do any good to do that. I’m currently not in possession of such a thing, nor do I wish to be. If you really want to search for the connection, I suggest you do this through a Tesk-Top as to not run the risk of infecting your own machine. Public Keystroke Loggers usually aren’t the most sophisticated of malevolent programs. You probably won’t be able to trace anything back though (this all varies).[/quote]

He didn’t make it, a program I’m well aware of generated his .exe file that he uses, so it won’t be too sophisticated

oh and keylogger infections are so detectable, i can have one off of my computer within 20 seconds of being infected

Read full topic

item.title: Stay away from kidgoku4522
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Kodiak:

I don’t. But I do know how keyloggers work up and down. Get me one of his keyloggers and I’ll try to go through it.

If he’s smart - it won’t do any good to do that. I’m currently not in possession of such a thing, nor do I wish to be. If you really want to search for the connection, I suggest you do this through a Tesk-Top as to not run the risk of infecting your own machine. Public Keystroke Loggers usually aren’t the most sophisticated of malevolent programs. You probably won’t be able to trace anything back though (this all varies).
